h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 10
content: A little further on, after you defeat the Stone Vanguard  <meta /> in Yellow Wind Ridge, you will slide down a slope from the Fright Cliff \- Rock Clash Platform Shrine. Halfway down the slope is a statue on the left and a chest with the Blood of the Iron Bull.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Location 10'.
The content is as follows:
A little further on, after you defeat the Stone Vanguard  <meta /> in Yellow Wind Ridge, you will slide down a slope from the Fright Cliff \- Rock Clash Platform Shrine. Halfway down the slope is a statue on the left and a chest with the Blood of the Iron Bull.
